title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
For Task A, the response must correctly define devolution.

For Task B, the response must correctly explain why some governments devolve power.

For Task C, the response must correctly explain how devolution may affect policy making.

For Task D, the response must correctly explain how devolution may weaken legitimacy.
descriptions: The responses accomplish none of the tasks set by the question
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
